name: Father/Daughter Dance
description: The theme of this year's dances is Denim and Diamonds! Bust out your best denim, bling, and/or western attire and dance the night away!

name: Mother/Son Dance
description: The theme of this year's dances is Denim and Diamonds! Bust out your best denim, bling, and/or western attire and dance the night away!

name: Valentine's Day Celebration
description: PARENTS: Bring 1 Valentine's card for all 22 friends in the class, leave 'To' section of the card blank. Wear PJs to school.

name: Sports Shirt Spirit Day
description: PARENTS: Send child to school wearing a sports-themed shirt.

name: Elementary schools out 2 hours early
description: Elementary schools out 2 hours early

name: Galentine's Night Out at F45 Branham Park
description: 45 minutes of strength training work out followed by bubbles. This is a free event with a maximum of 30 people, so sign up now!

name: Family Fun Night- Five Guys
description: Mention Los Alamitos and 25% of proceeds will be donated to the PTA!

name: Family Fun Night- Five Guys
description: Mention Los Alamitos and 25% of proceeds will be donated to the PTA!

name: Yearbook Cover Contest (5th Graders Only)
description: Entries due by February 23, 2026. Theme: Under the Sea. Must include 'Los Alamitos' and '2025-2026'.

name: Variety Show - Volunteers & Important Info
description: Volunteer opportunities include Stage Hands and Concession Organizer. To apply to perform, submit audition videos by March 1st, 2026. Dress Rehearsal is on March 19th, 2026 at 4:00 pm.

name: Yearbook Orders
description: Last day to order the 2025-26 Yearbook. 5th grade parents, send in your child's baby photos by March 1st.

name: Middle School Selection Process
description: Families will submit school choice requests online through the School Choice section of Parent Portal, which will be open from January 20 through February 13, 2026.

name: Reading Lab Volunteers Needed
description: The Reading Lab is a tutoring program for students who would benefit from extra help with fundamental reading skills. Volunteers are needed on Tuesdays, Wednesdays, or Thursdays.

description: Elementary schools out 2 hours early

description: All schools out 2 hours early
